Macro.Name: AP_KEYS_CHANGED

MouseClick.Script: (L:Autopilot Mode, number) 1 + (>L:Autopilot Mode, number) (L:Autopilot Mode, number) 4 == if{ 0 (>L:Autopilot Mode, number) }

Update.Script:
!lua
local SIMD = bool(varget("A:SIM DISABLED","Number")) if (SIMD == true) then return 1 end
if (AP_INIT == nil) then AP_INIT = true
--Prev AP Master state OLD_AP_MASTER = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT MASTER","Number"))
--Prev HDG Hold and HDG Hold Switch states OLD_HDG_HOLD = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK","Number")) varset("L:HDG_SW_STATE", OLD_HDG_HOLD) OLD_HDG_SW_STATE = OLD_HDG_HOLD
--Prev ALT Hold and ALT Hold Switch states OLD_ALT_HOLD = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK","Number")) varset("L:ALT_SW_STATE", OLD_ALT_HOLD) varset("L:I_ALT_HLD_MODE", OLD_ALT_HOLD) -- Internal use of AP ALT HLD mode OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = OLD_ALT_HOLD
-- --Prev AP Mode Switch position OLD_AP_MODE = 1 end
local needProcessAPMode = false --If need to process AP Mode switch position local I_ALT_HLD_MODE = varget("L:I_ALT_HLD_MODE", "Number") -- current internal ALT HLD MODE (0-disabled, 1-enabled, 3-enabled for pith emulation)
-- Process AP Master state local AP_MASTER = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT MASTER","Number")) if not (OLD_AP_MASTER == AP_MASTER) then OLD_AP_MASTER = AP_MASTER
if (AP_MASTER == false) then varset("K:AP_HDG_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_ATT_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_ALT_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_LOC_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_APR_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_PANEL_HEADING_OFF", 1) varset("L:Autopilot Mode", 0)
return 1 else --varset("K:KEY_YAW_DAMPER_ON", 1) --varset("K:KEY_YAW_DAMPER_TOGGLE", 1) end end
local appModesChanged = false
-----------------Heading Hold State----------------- -- Process SIM Heading hold state -- It may be switching off, to example, after intercepting localizer local HDG_HOLD = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK","Number")) if not (OLD_HDG_HOLD == HDG_HOLD) then OLD_HDG_HOLD = HDG_HOLD if (HDG_HOLD == false) then --Set switch state to off OLD_HDG_SW_STATE = 0 else --Set switch state to on OLD_HDG_SW_STATE = 1 end varset("L:HDG_SW_STATE", OLD_HDG_SW_STATE) end
-- Process HDG Hold Switch state local HDG_SW_STATE = varget("L:HDG_SW_STATE","Number") if not (OLD_HDG_SW_STATE == HDG_SW_STATE) then if (AP_MASTER == false) then --Simulate switch off from detent local SIM_TIME = varget("A:SIM TIME","Number") if (SIM_TIME - HDG_SW_STATE) > 1 then OLD_HDG_SW_STATE = 0 varset("L:HDG_SW_STATE", OLD_HDG_SW_STATE) end else appModesChanged = true -- Update old_states to expected for next update if (HDG_HOLD == true) then varset("K:AP_PANEL_HEADING_OFF", 1) else varset("K:AP_PANEL_HEADING_ON", 1) end
--varset("L:HDG_SW_STATE", OLD_HDG_SW_STATE) end end
-----------------Altitude Hold State----------------- -- Process SIM Altitude hold state -- It may be switching off, to example, after intercepting glidescope local ALT_HOLD = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK","Number")) if not (OLD_ALT_HOLD == ALT_HOLD) then OLD_ALT_HOLD = ALT_HOLD
if not (I_ALT_HLD_MODE == 3) then -- If ALT HLD not used for Pitch emulate, then we can change Alt Switch state if (ALT_HOLD == false) then --Set switch state to off OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = 0 else --Set switch state to on OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = 1 end else OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = 0 end
varset("L:ALT_SW_STATE", OLD_ALT_SW_STATE) end
-- Process ALT Hold Switch state local ALT_SW_STATE = varget("L:ALT_SW_STATE","Number") if not (OLD_ALT_SW_STATE == ALT_SW_STATE) then if (AP_MASTER == false) then --Simulate switch off from detent local SIM_TIME = varget("A:SIM TIME","Number") if (SIM_TIME - ALT_SW_STATE) > 1 then OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = 0 varset("L:ALT_SW_STATE", OLD_ALT_SW_STATE) end else -- Update old_states to expected for next update OLD_ALT_SW_STATE = ALT_SW_STATE
if (I_ALT_HLD_MODE == 3) then -- If ALT HOlD enabled for Pitch simulation, then just set it as enabled I_ALT_HLD_MODE = 1 else if (ALT_HOLD == true) then varset("K:AP_ALT_HOLD_OFF", 1) I_ALT_HLD_MODE = 0 varset("L:ALT_SW_STATE", 0) else I_ALT_HLD_MODE = 1 varset("K:AP_ALT_HOLD_ON", 1) --XXX: Setting altitude value from Lua not working! --local ia = varget("A:INDICATED ALTITUDE", "Feet") --local ia = varget("A:INDICATED ALTITUDE", "Number") --varset("A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE LOCK VAR", "4000") end end end end
-----------------AP Mode Switch State----------------- local AP_MODE = varget("L:Autopilot Mode", "Number") if not (OLD_AP_MODE == AP_MODE) then OLD_AP_MODE = AP_MODE if (AP_MODE == 0) then -- In MAN mode LOC AND GS modes disabled varset("K:AP_LOC_HOLD_OFF", 1) varset("K:AP_APR_HOLD_OFF", 1) else if (I_ALT_HLD_MODE == 3) then varset("K:AP_ALT_HOLD_OFF", 1) I_ALT_HLD_MODE = 0 end if(AP_MODE == 1) then -- In NAV LOC mode enable LOC HOLD mode varset("K:AP_LOC_HOLD_ON", 1) elseif(AP_MODE == 2) then -- In AUTO G/S mode enable APR HOLD mode varset("K:AP_APR_HOLD_ON", 1) elseif(AP_MODE == 3) then -- In MAN G/S mode enable only LOC HOLD mode -- MAN G/S mode currently is not working properly varset("K:AP_LOC_HOLD_ON", 1) end end end
-----------------Misc procedures----------------- -- Check for ATT AP mode if (AP_MASTER == true) and (appModesChanged == false) then if (AP_MODE == 0) then varset("K:AP_WING_LEVELER_OFF",1) --XXX:??? local ATT_HOLD = bool(varget("A:AUTOPILOT ATTITUDE HOLD","Number")) if (HDG_HOLD == false) and (I_ALT_HLD_MODE == 0) then --With MAN AP mode if HDG and ALT holding is disabled then enable ATT HOLD if (ATT_HOLD == false) then varset("K:AP_ATT_HOLD_ON", 1) --varset("K:AP_WING_LEVELER_ON",1) --XXX:??? varset("K:AP_WING_LEVELER_OFF",1) --XXX:??? end elseif (HDG_HOLD == true) and (I_ALT_HLD_MODE == 0) then I_ALT_HLD_MODE = 3 --TODO: Set current VSI value varset("K:AP_ALT_HOLD_ON", 1) end end end
varset("L:I_ALT_HLD_MODE", I_ALT_HLD_MODE)
--soundOneShot("CatapultLaunch.wav")
return 1
